# Dream, Minor (Spell)
## Overview
[[Illusion Spells|Illusion]] ([[Figment Spells|figment]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Alchemist Spells|Alchemist 2]], [[3rd Level Bard Spells|Bard 3]], [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[2nd Level Witch Spells|Witch 2]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 minute

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Unlimited

**Target:** You or one gnome touched

**Duration:** See text

**Save:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Advanced Race Guide, pg. 39

This spell functions as the *[[Dream (Spell)|dream]]* spell, except as follows. The messenger must be yourself or a gnome touched. The message can be no longer than 20 words. If the recipient of the message is not asleep when the spell is cast, the spell automatically fails.
